name: nfsbv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0

stmt.origin: nfxfr(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s2, w0), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s2, w0), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s2, w0), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s2)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| wnf(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wnf(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0))
-| wnf(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wnf(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s2))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s2))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))

|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: If ` z ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` x ` , ` y ` and ` z ` are distinct. Version of ~ nfsb requiring more disjoint variables, but fewer axioms. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 7-Feb-2023.)
